attributes.action: Apologise for the treatment of the working class by the ruling classes, employers and everybody else who treats them like second-class citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There's been plenty of apologies bandied around recently for slavery and the disgraceful Austrailian emigrees case but closer to home, the working class have been treated abysmally over the centuries and are still being regarded as lower than second-class citizens despite the major steps forward which have happened over the last century.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
